backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with membership pricing, user profiles, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics types, and storage state for IDs and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to impacted frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend source files and their responsibilities for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML root template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements the startup flow with identity, actor, routing, and profile loading stages plus error handling and payment-route support.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component showing an access-denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Card component displaying deal analysis metrics, rating badge, and comparable sales list.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell managing navigation, lazy‑loaded pages, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI and allows resetting after errors.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s summary info including contact details, budget, and preferred areas with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers with form fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays uploaded contracts for a deal with loading, error, and view actions.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Uploads contract files with validation, progress tracking, and document type selection.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Compact card showing deal address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with an edit action.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Modal form for creating, editing, and deleting deals with full field state management and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked-feature card prompting the user to upgrade to a required membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart summarizing closed profits and estimated fees from deal data.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Error display component with retry, secondary action, and optional contact support button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal for initial user profile setup with name, phone, email, and save‑profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table of total profit grouped by zip code or a fallback message if empty.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Branded sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with value props and a login button.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Startup‑failure UI showing an error message with retry and contact‑support actions.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Splash loading screen with branding and a spinner shown during app startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds a backend actor with improved initialization, optional admin token setup, and readiness state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Offers a media query hook that tracks match state and a convenience hook for mobile detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for profiles, admin checks, and domain features with normalized errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a dark theme color system using CSS variables for the app UI.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized UI text and error messages for navigation, errors, empty states, and admin sections.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Provides helper functions for MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fee calculations.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Contains membership tier access rules and utilities for feature gating and deal limits.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats and parses USD amounts between bigint cents and display strings.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Utilities for generating support email links and triggering mailto actions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe settings with form-bound state.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only analytics view showing key metrics and profit-by-zip with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Pro/Enterprise page for viewing, creating, and editing buyers, including gated access and editor dialog controls.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only contracts manager allowing deal selection and uploading/listing documents with detailed error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing deal metrics, charts, and membership info with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: AI-driven deal analyzer that processes an address, displays analysis, and lets users add the result to the pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Renders the deals pipeline UI, loads deals and user profile, enforces membership limits, and manages deal creation/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership tiers with pricing and features, toggles annual/monthly billing, and creates Stripe checkout sessions for upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment canceled message, extracts the session ID, and provides navigation back to membership or the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles payment success by confirming the membership purchase, updating the profile, and showing status or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, fonts, shadows, and content paths with extended design tokens and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including known startup issues and four existing features focused on fixing app launch reliability, profile loading, error reporting, and payment-result routing.
